entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the subject of a conversation about her being alive or dead. She is described as 'tough' and capable of teaching others about Wrackspurts and Nargles.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is part of the conversation about Luna's fate and mentions that she would likely be in Azkaban if she were alive.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also part of the conversation, expressing her hope for Luna's safety and mentioning her sympathy for Xenophilius.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having a positive opinion about Luna's chances of survival in Azkaban.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is mentioned as someone Hermione would feel sorry for if something bad happened to him.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a place where Luna would likely be if she were alive.

entities.name: wrackspurts
entities.description: Wrackspurts are mentioned as something Luna might teach others about in Azkaban.

entities.name: nargles
entities.description: Nargles are also mentioned as something Luna might teach others about in Azkaban.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group that Xenophilius tried to sell the trio to.

relationships.description: Harry hopes for Luna's survival in Azkaban.
Ron mentions that if Luna were alive, she would likely be in Azkaban.
Hermione expresses her sympathy for Xenophilius.
Luna is described as teaching others about Wrackspurts and Nargles.
Xenophilius tried to sell the trio to the Death Eaters.
